#summary List of NPC Commands
#labels IFCommands,ACTCommands,NPC

= Introduction =

List of #IF and #ACT NPC Commands, currently unfiltered.
Majority of these commands can be used on a Hero by adding Hero. to the front of the commands.
For example: HERO.GIVE Candle
